tasks.label: PS: Run active script
tasks.detail: Run the file in the current editor with PowerShell 7

tasks.label: PS: Format all (*.ps1, *.psm1)
tasks.detail: Bulk format every PowerShell file in the workspace using Invoke-Formatter
tasks.command: pwsh -NoProfile -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path '${workspaceFolder}' -Include *.ps1,*.psm1 -Recurse | ForEach-Object { $c = Get-Content $_.FullName -Raw; $f = Invoke-Formatter -ScriptDefinition $c; if ($f) { Set-Content -Path $_.FullName -Value $f -NoNewline } }"

tasks.label: Git: Sync (fetch+pull+push)
tasks.command: pwsh -NoProfile -Command "git fetch --all; git pull --ff-only; git push"
